overview: A narrative that tells the true story of a young lesbian named Hailey, who attempts to create a Gay-Straight Alliance (GSA) club during her time in high school. Despite the backlash she knew she would receive due to religious, political, and cultural pressures, Hailey was determined to create a connection with other LGBTQ youth and allies. This biopic demonstrates how Hailey and her friends uplift their small town despite a number of struggles.
title: The Gay Club
